value.0:
This orb is made of shiny obsidian glass that is cool to the touch. Just beneath its surface, the sphere holds a wreath of flame endlessly twisting and burning. It gives the holder an uneasy feeling...As though this orb is an object of great power. Though, how to take advantage of it has been lost to time and the ages...

The longer one stares into the firey depths of the orb...the more their unease will grow. Strange thoughts and words will begin to fill their head - and even in inside the orb they will see dark and terrible things beyond their understanding.
